statements: SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_regulations
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM cryptocurrency_regulations
SELECT regulation_id, compliance_status FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_regulations ORDER BY compliance_date DESC
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, compliance_status FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'SEC'
SELECT regulation_id, regulation_name, regulatory_body, compliance_status, compliance_date FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE regulatory_body = 'SEC' ORDER BY compliance_date DESC
SELECT * FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE compliance_status = TRUE ORDER BY regulation_name ASC
SELECT regulation_name, regulatory_body FROM cryptocurrency_regulations WHERE compliance_status = FALSE AND regulation_id > 3
SELECT regulatory_body, COUNT(*) AS total_regulations FROM cryptocurrency_regulations GROUP BY regulatory_body HAVING total_regulations > 1
SELECT AVG(regulation_id) AS avg_regulation_id, MAX(compliance_date) AS latest_compliance_date FROM cryptocurrency_regulations
SELECT * FROM compliance_data ORDER BY country, company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name, regulation_type FROM compliance_data WHERE country='USA';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type='GDPR';
SELECT company_name, country, regulation_type FROM compliance_data ORDER BY regulation_type ASC;
SELECT id, company_name, country FROM compliance_data WHERE country='Germany';
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE country = 'US';
SELECT company_name, regulation_type AS type FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'GDPR' ORDER BY company_name DESC;
SELECT company_name AS 'Company Name', country AS 'Location' FROM compliance_data WHERE regulation_type = 'HIPAA' LIMIT 10;

SELECT company_name, COUNT(*) AS 'Total Transactions' FROM compliance_data cd JOIN transaction_logs tl ON cd.id = tl.compliance_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING COUNT(*) > 5 ORDER BY 'Total Transactions' DESC;

SELECT company_name, SUM(amount) AS 'Total Amount' FROM compliance_data cd JOIN transaction_logs tl ON cd.id = tl.compliance_id GROUP BY company_name HAVING SUM(amount) > 10000 ORDER BY 'Total Amount' DESC;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT law_name, law_category FROM law_regulations WHERE law_category='Privacy';
SELECT * FROM compliance_history WHERE timestamp >= '2022-01-01' AND compliance_status='Violated';
SELECT transaction_id, timestamp FROM compliance_data WHERE transaction_id=12345;
SELECT * FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Pending';
SELECT transaction_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Approved' ORDER BY timestamp DESC;
SELECT DISTINCT law_category FROM law_regulations WHERE law_description LIKE '%privacy%';
SELECT transaction_id, compliance_status FROM compliance_data WHERE compliance_status='Denied' ORDER BY transaction_id ASC, timestamp DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, MAX(timestamp) AS latest_timestamp FROM compliance_history GROUP BY transaction_id HAVING COUNT(*) > 1;
SELECT * FROM recording_regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY date DESC, compliance_status ASC;
SELECT transaction_id, date, compliance_status FROM recording_regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT sender, receiver, amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions WHERE amount > 1000;
SELECT * FROM law_and_regulations WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA';
SELECT id, entry_datetime, user_id, activity_description FROM compliance_audit_logs ORDER BY entry_datetime DESC;
SELECT * FROM recording_regulatory_compliance_data ORDER BY date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT sender, receiver, SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM cryptocurrency_transactions GROUP BY sender, receiver HAVING total_amount > 1000;
SELECT id, law_description, jurisdiction FROM law_and_regulations WHERE jurisdiction = 'USA' ORDER BY id ASC;
SELECT user_id, entry_datetime, activity_description FROM compliance_audit_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY entry_datetime DESC LIMIT 5;
SELECT transaction_id, compliance_status FROM recording_regulatory_compliance_data WHERE compliance_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data;
SELECT user_id, full_name, email FROM users;
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT country_name FROM countries WHERE country_id = 3;
SELECT log_id, user_id, log_date, action_performed FROM compliance_logs WHERE user_id = 5678;
SELECT * FROM regulatory_compliance_data LIMIT 10;
SELECT full_name, email, address FROM users WHERE date_of_birth < '1990-01-01';
SELECT transaction_id, amount, currency FROM transactions ORDER BY amount DESC;
SELECT id, user_id, compliance_status FROM regulatory_compliance_data WHERE country = 'USA';
SELECT log_date, action_performed FROM compliance_logs WHERE user_id = 12345 ORDER BY log_date DESC;
